name: Timber
resume:
Journey to the mysterious Timber Hearth, the lush, verdant planet where ancient secrets lie beneath its quiet surface.
   Explore its forests and caves, navigate through floating islands, and uncover the mysteries of the Nomai, a long-lost civilization.
presentation:
Step into the enigmatic world of Timber Hearth, a planet rich in natural beauty and hidden ancient knowledge.
Explore its dense forests, cavernous undergrounds, and towering stone arches.

Learn about the Nomai ruins scattered across the planet, discover their past, and delve into the quantum mechanics that shape this mysterious world.

Whether you're a scientist, an explorer, or a mystery-seeker, Timber Hearth offers a one-of-a-kind adventure to the heart of the unknown.

schedule.description1:
Start your adventure by exploring the planet's lush surface.
   Navigate through forests, ascend to floating islands, and discover the vibrant fauna that call this planet home.
schedule.description2:
Visit the mysterious Nomai ruins scattered across the planet.
   Learn about their culture, technology, and their connection to the greater mysteries of the universe.

schedule.description1:

   Discover glowing crystals and hidden chambers as you uncover ancient artifacts left behind by the Nomai.
schedule.description2:
Learn about the quantum phenomena that define Timber Hearth‚Äôs unique physics.
   Participate in experiments and explore the interplay between space and time in the heart of the planet.

schedule.description1:
Embark on a thrilling journey across Timber Hearth‚Äôs floating islands.
   Use your knowledge of gravity and physics to navigate the challenging terrain and uncover the secrets hidden in the sky.

Delve deeper into the mysteries of the Nomai, uncovering their ancient technology and their ultimate quest.
   Join an expedition to one of their most significant sites and try to piece together their history.
schedule.description2:
Observe a rare quantum rift that appears around Timber Hearth.
   Witness the strange interactions between space and time as you study the rift's effects on the environment.
